details.description: Contact details for the Child Support Agency (CSA) for information about child maintenance, and for employers making deductions from employees' pay
details.body:
Get information about child maintenance from the Child Support Agency (CSA).

Applications and case queries

Contact your local CSA office if you want to register a new application or have a query about an existing one.

Information about the CSA

Contact the helpline for general information about the CSA.

Child Support Agency Helpline

Telephone: 0845 713 3133
Textphone: 0845 713 8924
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Saturdays, 9am to 5pm

The helpline will be closed on Christmas Day, Boxing Day and New Yearâ€™s Day (and 2 January in Scotland). On Monday 31 December the helpline will close at 5pm.

Employers

Get help from the CSA employer helpline if you need to make child maintenance deductions from an employee’s pay.

Child Support Agency employer helpline

Telephone: 0845 713 6010
Textphone: 0845 713 8924
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm
